title: Strategy Diagnositics
content:
Is there clarity with the actions, targets and strategy of the company?.

 Is there a visual daily tool that give us the direction and everybody is commit with? Is there clarity of what everybody is doing?.

title: Business Inteligence and Analytics Engineering
content:
Now with the knowledge of Bi and Operation and Commercial Business Development, I create the KPI´s , 
    I create a daily visual tool that keep update and online all the desicion-makers alined to the Business Plan. Lets create the Data Culture.

title: Visualization Tool
content: And now, I create a daily visual tool that keep update and online all the desicion-makers alined to the Business Plan. Lets create the Data Culture.

title: Business Plan and Data Culture
content: Let me scan the overall of the priority process and actions (iniciatives) that direct to the strategy. Every initiative should have measurable objectives by the KPI´s. All the objectives, kpi´s and iniciatives build the Business Plan.
